bioconda.name: bioconductor-cancersubtypes
bioconda.summary: Cancer subtypes identification, validation and visualization based on multiple genomic data sets

biotools.summary: This tool integrates the current common computational biology methods for cancer subtypes identification and provides a standarized framework for cancer subtypes analysis based on genomic datasets.

bioschemas.name: CancerSubtypes
bioschemas.summary: This tool integrates the current common computational biology methods for cancer subtypes identification and provides a standarized framework for cancer subtypes analysis based on genomic datasets.
